subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: If a deal under discussion is completed, the highly regarded Coach Doc Rivers and Kevin Garnett, 37, of Boston would be sent to Los Angeles for center DeAndre Jordan and a No. 1 pick.
snippet: If a deal under discussion is completed, the highly regarded Coach Doc Rivers and Kevin Garnett, 37, of Boston would be sent to Los Angeles for center DeAndre Jordan and a No. 1 pick.
